# m3ter_transaction_type (Resource)

Transaction type resource



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Descriptive name for the Transaction Type.

### Optional

- `archived` (Boolean) Whether the Transaction Type is archived.
- `code` (String) Code of the Transaction Type - unique short code used to identify the Transaction Type.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Transaction Type identifier
- `version` (Number) Transaction Type version
